attributes.action: Make Formula 1 a category A event in the Ofcom Code on Sports
attributes.additional_details: For a sport associated with global travel more than any other, most Formula 1 teams are based in Britain. Britain is centre of the universe for Motorsport. For decades Formula 1 has been a standard viewing slot for many households until corporate greed started robbing many of the chance to watch F1 for free on terrestrial TV. In 2019, Formula 1 will for the first time become unavailable on free terrestrial TV robbing many the chance to enjoy some great racing & support their teams & drivers.
attributes.background: Formula 1 should be classified as a category A event in Britain to stop corporate greed robbing millions of the chance to watch F1 on free terrestrial TV. Moving to pay TV only in 2019 to SKY gives them a monopoly over one of the most popular sports in the world & barring millions from watching it

rejection.details:
we think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125622
